LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Topics in Modern/Contemporary Canadian Literature II

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite  (ENGL200 and ENGL290) and (A GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
Exclusion     No more than 6 units from ENGL385; ENGL386; ENGL466; ENG467
